summary: The sorry in semantic_task_rel_compositionality is mathematically unavoidable in the finite model - the theorem is false for unbounded duration sums. This is acceptable because semantic_weak_completeness (sorry-free) does not use this lemma.

artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing the finite model compositionality limitation and recommending acceptance of the sorry

next_steps: No implementation recommended - the sorry documents a mathematical limitation. Optionally implement bounded variant.
